channel.title: oberlausitz on Nothing to see there
channel.description: Recent content in oberlausitz on Nothing to see there

item.title: Oberlausitz by train (Ostritz - Zittau - Bautzen): a day trip from Görlitz
item.description: This is a perfect day trip from Görlitz: buy a day train ticket for Saxony and explore the historic region of Oberlausitz at your own pace. We will cross the border, visit an abbey, walk on the medieval city wall and many more.
